title: Zeek - Files
description: -   This dashboard provides details for Files, Portable Executable and X.509 Certificate Info.

definition.content:
## Overview
- This dashboard provides details for Files, Portable Executable and X.509 Certificate Info.

## Widgets
1. File Stream Bytes Over Time
2. Locally Originated Files
3. Files by Source
4. Files Sent by Connection Originator
5. Top 10 File Analyzers
6. Files Received from Responder
7. Top 10 MIME Types
8. Files Log Details
9. Total Executable Files
10. Executables With ASLR Support
11. Executables With DEP Support
12. Executables With Enforced Code Integrity
13. File Types
14. Executable Target Machine
15. Executable Operating Systems
16. PE Log Details
17. Total Certificates
18. End Host Certificates
19. Chain Certificates
20. Certificates Sent from Client
21. Certificates by Versions
22. Certificates by Key Algorithm and Key Type
23. Certificates by Signature Algorithms
24. X.509 Log Details

definition.title: Certificates by Key Algorithm and Key Type
